description: Data currently show FYTD 2014 snapshot through the end of June 2014. This dataset is updated each month to show the newest data from the Governor's Office of Minority Affairs, GOMA. The data show SHA contract dollars awarded to Minority Business Enterprise (MBE) licensed businesses, for prime contractors and subcontractors.
